dialogues.text: THUNK! As an ARROW connects CRUDE WOODEN TARGET. Reverse see: Tiger Lily holding the bow. She hands it to Peter. Hook, leaning against an adobe wall, munching on a neverfruit, watches in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Take it. Now focus on the target and fire. Block everything else out. And focus. Peter nocks the arrow and- THUNK! Hook DUCKS as the arrow connects with the adobe wall, inches from his head. Tiger Lily shakes her head.  Fuchs 10.9.13 63. TIGER LILY (CONT’D) Again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tiger Lily and Hook climb up a massive nevertree en route a lookout’ post.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: From the look-out, I want you to show us where you saw the air- Galleons docked and- A branch CRACKS under her and she FALLS into Hook’s arms he CATCHES her.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Woah. You alright there?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Let go of me! She practically JUMPS away from him. Hook’s visibly insul by her reaction.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Oh, excuse me. I’m sure human contact can be very perzing to royalty like yourself, your highness. She GLARES at him.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: I don’t have a problem with human contact. Hook raises a suggestive eyebrow at that with a twinkle i his eye. Tiger Lily opens her mouth, offended. About to s something back just as- Kiowa JOINS them on the branch.

dialogues.speaker: KIOWA
dialogues.text: Everything okay?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY HOOK
dialogues.text: Fine. Peachy. Kiowa nods. Suspicious. You can cut the weird energy with knife. He keeps moving and Hook and Tiger Lily follow.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: After you, princess. MOMENTS LATER- in the pillbox, Hook joins Kiowa and Tiger Lily. HOOK (CONT’D) Now the shipyards were-  Fuchs 10.9.13 64. Tiger Lily and Kiowa are ignoring him, looking the opposi way. Hook turns to see- MASSIVE PLUMES OF SMOKE, a FOREST FIRE RAGING.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Blackbeard. He’s burning the forests. Looking for Peter. Their POV -- as we see the FLAMES GROWING, the FIRES NEAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smoke here is so thick, it blocks out the sun. Air-Galleo everywhere, SPEWING GREEK FIRE, a crude form of napalm, o the canopy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turk, flanked by a detachment of pirates, leads Blackbear a tree.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: We found two more like this. Blackbeard leans forward to see-- a MARKING carved into t bark: an ARROW pointing toward the mountains beyond. Blackbeard smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We’re in the ring where Kiowa fought Hook. Tiger Lily hol LONG SPEAR as she and Peter watch KIOWA and another WARRI go at it.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: A warrior has to master the way of ts'kali. ON THE TWO WARRIORS-- as they do battle. It’s a stunning combination of Philippine Eskrima (blade fighting) and Brazilian capoeira. Tiger Lily hands Peter a SMALL DAGGER. She raises her spe

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Come at me. Peter looks down at the dagger.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Wait -- how come you get a spear?  Fuchs 10.9.13 65. Before he can even look up- TIGER LILY IS CHARGING AT HIM WITH A VICIOUS ROAR. Peter DUCKS, escapes a THRUST or two even BLOCKING a hit with his small dagger before Tiger Li SWEEPS his legs out from beneath him with the spear. ON PETER-- flat on the ground, Tiger Lily’s spear-point t his throat. PETER (CONT’D) Hey! That wasn’t fair!

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: You think the pirates fight fair? Peter stands furious.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Enough! My mother is out there! She needs me! You think I can concentrate on this, knowing that?!

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: You dishonor your mother by blaming her for your failure.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You want me to lead you? You want me to fight?! Take me to her! Until then, I won’t fight for you or anybody. He STABS his dagger into the rock. ON TIGER LILY-- as she watches him go. Kiowa joins her. T speak in their native language, the dialogue subtitled:

dialogues.speaker: KIOWA
dialogues.text: What if you’re wrong about him. What if they are spies? What if this was a trap to find our base and-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop it! We can trust them. We can trust them. Kiowa sighs.

dialogues.speaker: KIOWA
dialogues.text: When are you going to tell him everything? He has to know.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Not yet. When he’s ready. We see determination in her eyes, but also sadness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter passes Hook on his way to their hut.  Fuchs 10.9.13

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Where do you think you’re going? Peter stops, near tears.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: These things they expect me to do...I can’t do them, Hook!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: What are you talking about? What happened?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: They’re going to find out. They’re going to see I’m not their bloody messiah, that I’m just- me!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Hey! Stop! Stop it. Listen.... 66. Hook takes a deep breath. Peter doesn’t even look at him.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I don’t know what you are. I know that you flew. Maybe you got some dust on you, maybe you are half fairy, maybe it was a once ina lifetime miracle! I don’t know. But I knew you were different before that. In the mines, when you stood up for that girl... Peter’s eyes lock with Hook’s.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That was a brave thing you did. It was probably what I should have lone. Hook shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Does that mean you’re the One? I don’t know. I don’t know if there is a ‘One’. But I do know that if you aren’t the guy -- if you are just you...maybe that’s enough. Peter looks moved. Hook gets uncomfortable, immediately s back down.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look, kid, you want to find your mom. I want to get my pixum. Just hold on a little longer. Make ‘em believe and we can get what we came for. Go our separate ways. Alright? Peter nods.  Fuchs 10.9.13 67.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON TIGER LILY’S FACE-- in bed, but can’t sleep, when we h THUNK. ..THUNK...THUNK... Tiger Lily frowns, sitting up. She PUSHES herself off the cot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON PETER-- in the dead of night, practicing his archery. Tiger Lily, watching from a distance, unseen by Peter, smiles.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: What are you smiling about? She JUMPS, surprised to see Hook behind her.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sorry, do I make you nervous, princess? She starts to walk away. Hook follows her.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: No. You make me ana’ ihidu.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Excited?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, like when you have a rash, but worse.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Yeah, well, I definitely grow on you. Hook smiles as he walks with her onto a wooded path.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So, you and Kiowa-Pan...are you guys like a thing?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: What does this mean -- a ‘thing’?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Are you two, you know... (raises his brow) Human contact... Tiger Lily turns to Hook, stopping, alone now in the wood

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: We are promised to one another.  Fuchs 10.9.13 68.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Promised, really? So, how does that work?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: He is the bravest of our tribe. I am the chief’s daughter. It is written.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Got it. Got it. Well, that’s great. Good for you gu’ (beat, then And you Tove him?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Why wouldn’t I? He’s brave. Honest. He fights for his people. He’s not a mercenary hunting for a prize.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Oh- oh, like me? Hook smiles, shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: You don’t care about anything or anyone but yourself, do you?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: I happen to like myself, princess. Without realizing it, they’re drifting closer.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Kiowa says not to trust you... HOOK . I wouldn’t trust me, either. He leans in and KISSES her. She PULLS BACK, surprised-

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: How dare you?! You think because you want Something, you can just ake it?!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Who says I want you? He GRABS her, PULLING her in close and KISSES her the way you’re supposed to be kissed. She melts in his arms befor VWAP! She SLAPS him across the face.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: No. NO! She STORMS back off into the woods, leaving Hook alone.  Fuchs 10.9.13 69.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: (calling after her) Fine. FINE! It wasn’t such a great kiss anyway! He KICKS the dirt in front of him. Sighs.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tiger Lily! He STARTS to walk in her direction, when SUDDENLY we see come racing toward him. Hook shakes his head with a grin-

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: They always come running back.

dialogues.speaker: GO
dialogues.text: Hook frowns confused when-

dialogues.speaker: BREAKING THROUGH THE CLOUD COVER INTO THE NIGHT SKY.
dialogues.text: TIGER LILY (CONT’D) We have to warn the others!!!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: How did they find us?! I don’t understand! Hook and Tiger Lily RACE back toward the village as the Revenge is Joined yy a SECOND AIR-GALLEON...and then a THIRD...and then a FOURTH. EXT. QUEEN ANNE’S REVENGE - CONTINUOUS Turk, standing on deck, looks to Blackbeard who nods calm

dialogues.speaker: / BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Begin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON PETER-- as he nocks another arrow. When--

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Peter turns to see Hook and Tiger Lily running toward him BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! He DUCKS as a first VOLLEY OF CANNONF I RAINS DOWN on the village and- VWOOSH! One of the air- Galleons SOARS past overhead.  Fuchs 10.9.13 70. INT. KIOWA’S HUT - CONTINUOUS Kiowa HEARS the explosions and LEAPS out of bed, grabbing LONGBOW and racing out to see-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MASSACRE in progress - VILLAGERS running for their live EXPLOSIONS rock their sanctuary. ON THE REVENGE- Turk MARCHES down his line of CANNONEERS.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Fire! BOOM! We see the archery range destroyed.

dialogues.speaker: TURK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Fire! BOOM! A row of HUTS destroyed. TURK (CONT’D)

dialogues.speaker: FIRE
dialogues.text: Blackbeard watches over it all -- emotionless. ON PETER-- as he takes cover in a ditch with Hook and Tig Lily. They shout over the artillery fire-

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: (worried) Where's Smee?!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I don't know! Tiger Lily sneaks a look out of the ditch. Tiger Lily’s POV: ROPES drop from the air-Galleons and PIRATES start to drop down into the village. She ducks back down, turns to Peter.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: They ‘re coming for you. We have to get you out of here. Nothing else matters. ON KIOWA-- racing through the village, calling his warrio to battle as he pounds his chest.

dialogues.speaker: KIOWA
dialogues.text: subtitles) Stand and fight! Stand and fight!  Fuchs 10.9.13 71. As the PIRATES make landfall, the battle intensifies. Bru hand-to-hand combat as the village’s warriors make their futile last stand, fighting tooth and nail against the pirates’ firepower with their primitive weaponry. BACK IN THE DITCH-- they all shudder as -- BOOM! -- a cannonball explodes way too close for comfort. Tiger Lily looks to Peter-

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: There’s a ppassway out of the village. Through the canyon, down to the river. If we go now- We hear the WHISTLE of an incoming round.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Move, move, MOVE! Hook and Tiger tly leap in one direction, Peter in anothe as the cannonball ecimates the spot they were just crouch on. Artillery POUNDS the area around them and Peter SCAMPERS the foliage. ON THE REVENGE-- Blackbeard looks down on the battlefield his eyes scanning relentlessly.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Sir, we recovered our informant. Blackbeard turns to see-

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: Captain. Smee bows. Blackbeard nods. SMEE (CONT’D) Glad you saw my mark, sir.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: We thought we’d lost you. Where’s the boy?

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: I don’t know, but you need the chief. Him or his daughter. They know something youlre re going to want to find...something big. ON TIGER LILY-- as she and Hook dodge explosions, racing their lives.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: You did this! You brought them here! BAM! Another shell EXPLODES behind them.  Fuchs 10.9.13 72.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Then why are they trying to kill me, too, genius?! Before she can answer, sees—

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Aba' ye! We see her father, the Chief being hurried to safety by a SMALL RETINUE OF GUARDS. He turns to see Tiger Lily as- A HAIL OF GUNFIRE interrupts their path, taking out his tuards. Tiger Lily SCREAMS They turn back to see, the Rev owering to the ground, a WALL OF PIRATES led by Turk disembark, guns still smoking. Hook and Tiger Lily freeze. Caught. The wall of pirates p to reveal-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Going somewhere? Blackbeard steps off the ship. All around them, the pirat are wiping out the last gasps of resistance as Blackbeard moves closer.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The princess, I presume...

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Oh, I’m actually just_a digger, but I appreciate the compliment. Blackbeard smiles as-- BAM! Turk PUNCHES Hook in the back the head, sending him to the ground. Turk is about to hit again when——

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: Leave him alone! He doesn’t matter. Hook looks up to see Smee with the pirates.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: You?! Why would you do this?! Why would you-- He LAUNCHES himself at Smee. Turk restrains him.

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Hook. I am. I have family in those mines. You know what would have happened to them if I didn’t cooperate. I never thought it would come to this.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: God damn you, Smee! Before this is over, I’m going to kill you! Do you understand me?! That’s a promise!  Fuchs 10.9.13 73. ON BLACKBEARD-- as he zeroes in on Tiger Lily, takes her and kisses it. She SPITS in his face.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: (tsk tsk) Your highness, where are your manners? Blackbeard smiles. Nods to the chief.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Does he understand English? Tiger Lily shakes her head.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tell him exactly what I say. Blackbeard approaches. He pulls his REVOLVER and moves to the Chief. Tiger Lily translates as he speaks.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: A friend tells me you’ve been keeping secrets. That all this time while we‘ve been digging our hands raw for scraps of pixum, that you've been hiding something, shall we say, more substantial? ON PETER-- watching the scene unfold while hidden in the trees. Breathing heavy. Doesn’t know what to do. ON BLACKBEARD-- as he holds the gun up to face the Chief.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I’m going to make this very easy: Tell me the location of the hidden fairy kingdom and I will let you ive. The Chief responds.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: He asks what if he does not tell you.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Well... (cocks the gun) Let’s just hope he does. Gun raised to his chest, the Chief pauses, his eyes locke with Blackbeard’s. He finally responds.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: He- (choking back tears) He says death is the greatest adventure. Blackbeard doesn’t react then-  Fuchs 10.9.13 74.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Bon voyage. BAM! ON PETER’S FACE-- as we hear a GUNSHOT and Tiger Lil scream. Peter looks around panicked when- he HEARS someth behind him. He turns, parting the leaves to reveal: a NEVERBEAST grazing in the woods behind him. ON BLACKBEARD-- as he turns his gun on Tiger Lily.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Need I repeat myself? ON PETER-- as he STEPS toward the beast, carefully. As he gets closer, he sees another TWO NEVERBEASTS grazing behi it...and a SMALL HERD behind that. And we see in Peter’s desperate eyes an idea forming... ON TIGER LILY-- who stoically shakes her head.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: No. You don’t. She closes her eyes. Spreads her arms and quietly prays.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Hey! What are you doing?! Tell him! He’s gonna kill you, tell him! Tiger pily just KEEPS praying as Blackbeard cocks the gun ready to fire again when-

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: There's a map! Blackbeard looks to Hook.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Damn it, just don’t shoot her! She said there was a map in the caves that will lead you to the kingdom. Tiger Lily stares daggers at Hook.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: What are you doing?! Why would you do this?!

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: (eyes Hook) Is this true?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: I swear! She told Peter, Peter told me. There’s a hidden map. Search the caves you'll find it, alright? You got your kingdom, just let her go! Tiger Lily is shaking with rage.  Fuchs 10.9.13 75.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: How could you?! Traitor! (she hits Hook) You’‘ve destroyed everything!

dialogues.speaker: TRAITOR
dialogues.text: Blackbeard’s men separate them as-- we hear a RUMBLING.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: What is that? As- BOOM! B-BOOM! B-BOOM! A SMALL HERD OF NEVERBEASTS COM

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: What the-- (then, sees) Peter?! ON PETER-- holding on for dear life on top of one of the Neverbeasts while cannon fire explodes all around him, devastating the mountain base.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (terrified out of his mind One with the beast...one with the beast... ON HOOK-- as he turns to see, Tiger Lily coming at him.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Why did you do that?!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: I’m sorry for saving your life, sweetheart! I promise it’1l never happen again! Another RUMBLE pulls their attention upward to see: THE CLIFF WALL ABOVE BEGINNING TO CRUMBLE.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If they keep firing, this whole place is going to come apart! We ave to get out of here!

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Not without Peter! ON HOOK & TIGER LILY-- fighting their way to find Peter. they do- Tiger Lily SPOTS Kiowa, fighting off an ever gro circle of pirates. She stops in her tracks. As she moves help him, her eyes lock with Kiowa’s.

dialogues.speaker: KIOWA
dialogues.text: Asptities) . No! Go! The only thing that matters is the boy!  Fuchs 10.9.13 76. Tiger Lily is torn; she knows he doesn’t stand a_ chance without her. If she goes to him, Peter might be lost. KIOWA (CONT’D) I said go!

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Kiowa-Pan-

dialogues.speaker: KIOWA
dialogues.text: Go! And with that the pirates CLOSE IN on Kiowa and he disapp under their relentless assault. Gone.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Come on! We have to get to Peter! Come on! Tiger Lily, distraught, nods, and they race off. ON PETER-- riding the beast _as it BOUNDS through the yil until-- BAM! A cannonball HITS directly in front of its p and the animal REARS up, HURLING Peter off. He PUSHES himself off the ground to find--

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Hello, Peter. VWAM! Peter SPINS away as Blackbeard’s sword SLAMS into t ground. He LEAPS off the floor, pulling his DAGGER out. The two circle one another, blades drawn, as the mountain base begins to crumble under sustained cannon-fire all ar them.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Your friends are dying, Peter. For you. All this death and you're the reason, you know that. Why keep fighting? Blackbeard attacks, Peter is able to evade.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh, yes. To find your mother. That's why you won’t give up, isn’t it? You don’t care how many die for you, how many suffer, as long as you find her.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Shut up! You don’t know the first thing about me!

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Can I tell you the real tragic irony, Peter? Blackbeard SLICES his way closer.  Fuchs 10.9.13 77.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You’ll never find her. And do you know why? Blackbeard LUNGES toward Peter, knocking his DAGGER out o his hand, pressing Peter to the rocky wall behind him. ON BLACKBEARD-- as he raises his SWORD to Peter’s neck.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Because I killed her. Peter’s face pales.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Because she died at my hand with this very blade...

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: No. No, no, no... Peter’s eyes well up with tears. Rage coursing through hi veins as Blackbeard presses the blade harder into his thr

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Just like you’re about to. Tears stream down Peter’s face. Blackbeard shakes his hea He RAISES the sword.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don’t cry. Your mother didn’t. Die a hero, Peter. Close your eyes -- and think of a happy thought. Peter shuts his eyes and Blackbeard brings the blade down

dialogues.speaker: MISSILE, TAKING HIM DOWN.
dialogues.text: Hook and Blackbeard go rolling. They both PUSH themselves the floor, ready to go at it when--

dialogues.speaker: SEPARATING THE TWO.
dialogues.text: Hook spins back to Peter, now joined by Tiger Lily.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Far be it for me to tell the Chosen One and her holiness what to do, but we need to move! Now! ON BLACKBEARD-- enraged. As the Revenge passes above, sho __ BLACKBEARD ; Cease fire! Cease fire, damn it!!! ON OUR HEROES-- Tiger Lily leads the way as the AVALANCHE pursues them downhill. Hook sneaks a look over his should  Fuchs 10.9.13 78.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: We should run faster!!!

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Almost there! They race deeper into the mountains through a pass as- TIGER LILY (CONT’D) Almost! The ROCKS are almost upon them as they finally race aroun bend to see-

dialogues.speaker: A MOUNTAIN RIVER-PASS FLOWING OVER THE EDGE OF THE CLIFF
dialogues.text: A SPECTACULAR WATERFALL -- AND THEY’RE RACING RIGHT TOWAR THE DROP.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: This is your escape plan?!

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Unless you have something better- They reach the precipice-

dialogues.speaker: JUMP
dialogues.text: SCREAMING they all LEAP together and disappear into the M as the DEBRIS flies over their heads, just missing them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The village is in ruins; the pizates are rounding up the of the villagers into a makeshift pen. ON AYAIN’A-- her dirt streaked face saddened as a Turk pu her into the pen.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Turk! Turk turns to see his captain striding toward him.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Send two ships to find the boy. Save the rest to search the caves. We’re going hunting. The Revenge lowers and drops down a rope ladder for the captain, who takes it.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Hunting? For what? Blackbeard holds onto the ladder as the Revenge RISES.  Fuchs 10.9.13 79.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Fairies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON OUR HEROES-- shaken and soaked as they crawl their way dry land. Tiger Lily stands first, racing to Peter who sits, proppe against a tree.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Peter! Are you hurt? Peter doesn’t respond, catching his breath. Hook, flat on ground, lifts his hand.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: I’m fine, thanks for asking... Tiger Lily spins toward Hook, charges toward him.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: How dare you speak to me! How dare you?! as Hook stands, Tiger Lily POUNDS his chest with her ball ists. TIGER LILY (CONT’D) You told him about _the map! Now everything my people have fought to protect will be destroyed!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Did you want to die?! Because that’s what was about to happen!

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: You didn’t know your friend was with the pirates?! You lie! You knew!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: I said I didn’t know! I had no idea he was an informant, okay?! (then, notices) Where’s Peter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON PETER-- the world around him a blur as he walks, aimlessly, still in shock, stumbling through the wilderne

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Peter! Her voice is a distant echo. Peter just keeps walking.  Fuchs 10.9.13 80.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Peter! Tiger Lily grabs his arm, jerking Peter to a halt. He thrashes his arm free of her. Hook just watches.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Stop! Peter shakes his head. Tears beginning to stream down his face.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You lied to me...

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Peter, I’m sorry!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: {fall throated) You lied to me! Peter steps toward her.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Is it true?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: It’s complicated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Complicated?! Peter shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Is my mother alive or isn’t she?! That’s all I want to know! Tiger Lily looks from Hook to Peter. Then-

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Blackbeard spoke the truth. Peter doesn’t know what to say.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: And you lied to me- why? So, I'd fight with you? Lead your bloody rebellion?! Well, I guess the joke’s on you then, isn’t it?! Because I’m not the one you’re looking for!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Peter-—

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I believe my mother came to you! Okay? (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I believe my father was who you say he is and that I’m half fair Brilliant, but it doesn’t make me the fulfillment of Your prophesy! Whoever it is you think I am, whatever it is you expect me to be-- (pauses, then) I'm not and I can't! Peter turns and walks past her, back toward the riverbank leaving a shaken Tiger Lily and Hook.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: You should’ve told him... Tiger Lily stares at Hook with contempt.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Because of what you did, his mother died for nothing. She walks after Peter, passing Hook.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Just like my father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON-- Mary’s letter to Peter. Peter holds it in his hands as he stands at the river ban then, hopeless, tears the letter up, throwing the pieces the river. He stares at the pieces of paper washing away

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: {grabs him) Care She pulls him behind a tree, POINTS upward. An air-Galleo passes high above. They wait for it to pass in silence. T

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He’s not going to stop tooking fo for you. We have to get you somepla: safe.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: (emerging from the trees ) I’m sorry, oyu see what’s going on out note? Blackbeard’s on war footing. Nowhere on this island is safe. Tiger Lily hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: There is one place on this island even the pirates wouldn’t go. Peter looks to Hook and then back to Tiger Lily.  Fuchs 10.9.13 82.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Where’s that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We’re MOVING RAPIDLY over water.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: My people call it Na’afi Kuguri. In your words: Mermaid Lagoon. We keep PUSHING DOWN-RIVER until we find: a MAKESHIFT RAF floating downstream with our three heroes on it. As they make their way downstream, Tiger Lily sharpens a SPEAR made from branches with a pointed rock attached at end. Peter sits at the edge of the raft, his feet danglin the water.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Mermaid Lagoon? That’s the one place the pirates won’t go? Tiger Lily nods and hands Peter the spear. She starts wor on another one.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The pirates are afraid of mermaids?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: No. They’re afraid of what you have to pass through to get there. Hook, fashioning his own spear, smiles at Peter.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: You’re not afraid of a few crocs are you, Peter? Hook smiles. Peter pulls his feet out of the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turk leads a small pirate search party deeper into the ca

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: It’s got to be here somewhere! Keep looking! ON SMEE-- as he branches off down a side tunnel, holding torch. We TRACK him down the tunnel, until we see his eye widen and a smile appear as he sees something.

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: Blimey... MOMENTS LATER-- Smee hurriedly LEADS Blackbeard, Turk and group of PIRATES back to the Spot.  Fuchs 10.9.13 83. SMEE (CONT’D) Captain, I think-- Smee raises his torch to reveal on the wall: THE MAP TO T FAIRY KINGDOM. SMEE (CONT’D) You’re going to be very happy. Blackbeard, his face illuminated by Smee’s torchlight, le forward taking in the map.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Mr. Turk -- I want you to load up an air-Galleon with as many slaves as it can carry and bring them-- (points to the X on the Here. mr then I want you to fill another ship and another and another. As fast as you can.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Any particular kind of slave, sir?

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Diggers. Give me diggers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes continue their riverine journey to Mermaid Lag Several MAKE-SHIFT TORCHES are wedged into the flooring o the raft. ON PETER-- staring out at the woods, his head still somew else. Hook sits down next to him.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Do you care?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Noone) No. I don’t. Peter turns to him.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: When you got the telegram, that your mum had died -- how did you eep going?  Fuchs 10.9.13 84.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: I don’t know. At a certain age, you get to a place where enough bad stuff e7ebses and enough good stuff doesn’t , you accept your life isn’t going to be what you imagined it would be. You grow up. And you keep going because...you have to. ANGLE ON THE WATER-- as SEVERAL ROWS OF FIN-LIKE REPTILIA SCALES silently break the surface of the river. Unseen by heroes, they SNAKE toward the raft.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Happy endings are for story books, but story books are for kids, Peter. You can’t stay a kid forever. Even in Neverland. Peter considers this when-

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Hayathu! Peter and Hook jump up.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: What did she say? As they spin to see, behind them--

dialogues.speaker: THE GAPING JAWS OF AN 8 TON NEVER-CROC EMERGE FROM THE WA
dialogues.text: Peter and Hook stumble backward as the croc dives back do swimming underneath the raft.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Grab the torches! They’re afraid of the flame!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: We're going to be alright, kid! As long it’s only one of them!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Uh -- Hook.. Hook traces Peter's gaze to see-- the telltale SCALES of another Never-Croc breaking the surface, coming right at from the other direction.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Alright, that’s not great. (then) Get a torch, kid! What are you standing around for?! Peter GRABS a torch, as our three heroes move back-to-bac torches at the ready. A beat. No sign of them.  Fuchs 10.9.13 85.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Did we scare them off?

dialogues.speaker: GOT OUR FIRST GOOD LOOK AT THIS THING, WHICH RESEMBLES TH
dialogues.text: FAMED CRETACEOUS-ERA SARCOSUCHUS ("SUPER CROC”) MORE THAN ANYTHING ELSE.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jesus! (as it. SPLASHES down) They can fly?!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: They can’t fly, but they can sure as hell jump! Keep waving that thing! Higher! The second croc EXPLODES out of the river, SOARING over t and splashing down. The WAVES beneath the raft are buildi

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: They’re trying to knock us overbo- WHAM! A WAVE TILTS UP THE END OF THE RAFT PETER’S STANDIN

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Peter! PETER!

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Where'd he go!?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: He went down! I think I see him! Hook kneels down, thrusting his arm into the water.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Grab my hand! Take it! And_then-- we see Hook JERK downward and his face PALE as realizes something’s got him. He TRIES to pull his hand b but can’t.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I need some help! Help! Tiger Lily races over and STRAINS to pull Hook out. As sh PULLS him back onto the raft, he pulls out with him--

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Peter! Our hero, gasping for air.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: It had me! But it let go!  Fuchs 10.9.13 86. Hook looks up to see the Never-Croc scales, disappearing the other direction just as--

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: What are they running from? As- a light ILLUMINATES his face, distorted from beneath water. He looks down to see, beneath the surface: The bioluminescent outline of the sexiest, most beautiful MERMAID (20) you have ever seen. Her porcelain skin liter glows as if it were its own light source. ON PETER-- as he spots another one on his side.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Are these--

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Mermaids. These are sacred creatures. Even the crocodiles will not harm them.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: They’re so... Peter is completely consumed by their beauty. Hook nods.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: You can say that again. Tiger Lily makes a dismissive noise. Hook eyes her.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Problem? Tiger Lily ignores him, turns to Peter.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: They’re giving us safe passage.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Why’s that?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Because mermaids are creatures of the mind. They can read our thoughts...and they must feel we have something worth protecting. Tiger Lily eyes Peter. Peter just turns away. As we PULL to see: The raft surrounded by a POD OF MERMAIDS escorting them t safety.  Fuchs 10.9.13 87.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It’s night, but the MERMAIDS swimming beneath the surface illuminate the subterranean 1agoon | in_a kaleidoscope of colors so bright it could be the middle of the day. ON OUR HERO RAFT-- as it makes its way into the lagoon, passing a SHIP WRECK on the shore.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: They’11l protect us here for as long as we need them to. As they speak, the raft makes landfall, docking at a natu harbor on the perimeter of the lagoon.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: I’m going to check out that wreck. See if there’s anything worth salvaging. Hook hops off raft and heads toward the ship, leaving Pet alone with Tiger Lily.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: I’m sorry I did not tell you what happened to your mother -- but Blackbeard did not tell you the whole truth either.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I don’t understand.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Let me show you.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Show me? Tiger Lily nods. MOMENTS LATER-- Peter and Tiger Lily are in the water.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Because of the mermaids, the waters here are charged with their a’shana -- their energy. You can see through my eyes. Are you ready? Peter takes a deep breath.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I’m ready.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Hold your breath. And with that, Tiger Lily PLACES her hand on Peter's face begins to PRAY and then DUNKS him into the water like he’ being baptized.  Fuchs 10.9.13 88. ON PETER’S FACE-- his eyes close and the minute he’s submerged we are instantly TRANSPORTED TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VWOOSH! The images LAND into view like those in Dumbledor Pensieve. We're FLYING OVER AND THROUGH an epic battle between the pirates on the one side and the Natives and fairies on th other. Every so often the image ripples like its projecte over water. A fierce clash, but it’s clear the pirates ar winning.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We fought with our fairy brothers, but we could not reverse the tide... ON A_ SMALL, BEAUTIFUL NATIVE GIRL (5)-- as she watches t battle, terrified.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: I saw it all. And I watched as your mother did what thirty men coul not. We see Mary, dressed as a native warrior, her hair crop} short, and a virtual master in the martial art of ts’kali

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And it was still not enough. The last of the Fairy Kingdom was on the verge of devastation... In her eyes, we see she knows this is the end.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And so your mother told the Fairy King and his people to retreat. To disappear into the woods. That she would hold off Blackbeard as long as she could. ON MARY-- as she and Blackbeard go one on one. An epic sw fight between two titans. TIGER LILY (CONT’D) Until.. Blackbeard gets the advantage and-- we only see glimpses what happens next: Mary’s eyes WIDENING...her sword FALLING...Blackbeard’s f filled with hate... ANGLE ON MARY-- lies dying as the WHITE LIGHTS of the fai intensify around her.  Fuchs 10.9.13 89. TIGER LILY (CONT’D) She sacrificed herself to protect the Kingdom. But, in so doing, something extraordinary happened... We see the white lights, the fairies, around Mary, rotati around her, faster and faster. Until, they flare--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tiger Lily PULLS Peter’s head out of the water. He catche his breath.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: In death, she found new life. She became a part of the island. Her itu-awai, her life force, still, protects the secret of the kingdom. It pushes away all who seek to destroy it and has kept them hidden all these years. She is what has kept them safe.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I don’t understand...

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Your mother isn’t really gone, Peter. But if what she gave her life to protect is destroyed, what’s left of her will be destroyed with it. Peter shakes his head, wading back onto dry land.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: What if I can’t do what she did? What if I fail?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: If you don’t try, if you don’t fight -- then you have already failed. And Blackbeard has already won. As Peter considers this-

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Hey! They turn to see Hook approaching.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (smiles) You’re not going to believe what I found.  Fuchs 10.9.13 90.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON HOOK-- as he LEADS them toward the shipwreck.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: The hull’s pretty banged BP. Looks like teeth marks. Apparently those crocs can jump pretty high, but... Hook makes his way to the back of the ship, toward the engine, which he opens to reveal-

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Get a load of this. The engine is filled with pixum. Hook beams.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If I can fix that hull -- and I can -- it should be enough.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Enough for what?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: To get us the hell off this island. Peter turns away. Conflicted.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: After everything, you want to run like a coward?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: I mean, I hadn’t thought of it in those exact terms, but generally speaking...yes! Hook laughs. Tiger Lily doesn’t. Peter just stares at the water.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Good grief, I thought you two would be thrilled! Tiger Lily shakes her head. TIGER LILY. So, that’s it? You’ll go home.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Listen, princess, I don’t like Blackbeard any more than the next miner, but this fight’s over. Your base is gone. Whoever survived the attack is probably in a camp by now. (then) I’ve been in those camps. I’m not going back. Not for anything. x anyone.  Fuchs 10.9.13 gl.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: You know as well as I do what Blackbeard’s planning! Those ships? That invasion force? He’s comin for your world! And if he gets fo the hidden kingdom, he’11 Rave all the dust he needs to actually do it. You want to go home? You won’t have a home to go back to if we don’t stop him!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: That’s a guess!

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: It’s more than a guess!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: (shrugs ) Great, at least I’1l die later! We fight him now, we’re all dead and you know it. Tiger Lily keeps herself together, but we can see she’s h

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: If you have no reason to stay, then go.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Oh, don’t go mushy on me now, your Highness...

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: If you can leave us to die--

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: I don’t want you to die! I want you to come with me!

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: And if I don’t.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Then that’s your decision. Not mine. Tiger Lily glares at him and walks away, leaving Peter al with Hook.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Looks like it’s just you and me kid. You name the place and I’ iL take you there, just so long as it’s out of here. Peter hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What do you say?  Fuchs 10.9.13 92. Hook extends his hand. Peter takes a deep breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON TIGER LILY-- she sits her feet dangling in the water, she hears something and turns to see- Peter walking toward her.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Let’s get one thing straight: I’m not the Chosen One. The prophesy wasn’t about me if it was ever real at all and the sooner you get your mind around that fact, the better off we’ll all be. Tiger Lily’s face falls.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But I am my mother’s son. And if Blackbeard is going to destroy everything my parents died for, then I’m going to stand against him to the last. Just like they did. Peter’s blue eyes -- his mother’s eyes -- seem to burn mo fiercely than we’ve ever seen before.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Any questions?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Why are we still standing here? Peter smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AERIAL SHOT as we SWEEP OVER a dust mine that’s only in i nascent stages. MINERS are being unloaded by the shipload RUSHED into the dig. A rapid and massive mobilization of manpower that would put the builders of the ancient pyram to shame. ON THE GROUND-- Blackbeard marches through the camp with and Smee in tow.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: We should have two hundred more here by noon, Captain. And another two hundred after that by nightfall.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Keep them coming. Any sign of the boy?  Fuchs 10.9.13 93.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Not yet, sir. Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: All due respect, sir, I’ve spent some time with the boy and I promise you, you’ve got nothing to worry about.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: And why is that?

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: He’s weak. He’s afraid. And what’s more, none of the people believe in him. Not anymore.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Let’s keep it that way. As they enter-- INT. BLACKBEARD’S TENT - CONTINUOUS Tables are set up with maps lain out. It looks like a for military command base. Turk leads Blackbeard to the center table.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Captain, if you look over here, we have some of the plans you’d requested. Blackbeard leans over the table, taking it all in. Smee, looking over his shoulder, eyes the maps on the table and eyes widen. Smee’s POV: these aren’t maps of Neverland. They’re maps London. New York. Moscow. Tokyo.

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: My god...

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Do we have a problem?

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: No, no not at all, sir. It’s just...how are you going to pull off something like this? On this scale?

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: We have eyes and ears in their world, Mr. Smee. And theirs is a world now in chaos. A great war is being fought by all against all. Their world has never been more ripe for the taking.  Fuchs 10.9.13 94. Blackbeard turns back to the maps.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The dust of a freshly slaughtered fairy is infinitely more powerful than the bones of a long dead one. Once we have the pixum to fuel our armada -- there will be nothing that can stop us. (then) Do you know why they called me a pirate, Mr. Smee? Because I did the Crown’s dirty work. I did more damage to the Spanish and French fleets in a decade than the Royal Navy had in a century and didn’t get so much as a thank you. No. Instead, I became a liability. I made the world safe for the Crown and_in exchange the Crown made the world safe from men like me.

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: If you don’t mind my asking, why do yo want to go back? This place is ike Eden. Blackbeard shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: This place isn’t paradise. It’s a prison. A pixum gilded cage. Like Napoleon on Elba, I_ long for home. I yearn for the world I was chased from. My world, Mr. Smee. (smiles ) And now, after all this time, when they least expect it, I’m going to take it back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON THE KINGDOM MINE-- from a distance. Reveal: Peter and Tiger Lily surveilling the mine from a nearby hilltop. PETER ; He’s practically emptying out the camps to find this place...

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: With that many diggers, it’s not going to take him long.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I’ll say. Tiger Lily turns and begins to walk down the side of the hill. Peter follows.  Fuchs 10.9.13 95.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What are you thinking?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: We’re outnumbered. We're out! unned. The chances of success are s

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You really know how to give a good pep talk.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: If we’re going to stop Blackbeard, we’ re not going to be able to do it alone.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Well, yes, an army would be quite nice, ut how do you suppose we raise one and get it here in time? Tiger Lily thinks.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Maybe Blackbeard’s already done that part for us. Peter follows her gazs to see she’s staring at the ship-l of miners being unloaded into the camps.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Brilliant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON A ROW OF MINERS-- as they file into camp, among them: Peter and Tiger Lily. They blend perfectly into the sea o humanity coursing into the mine.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: We have to find Ayain’ a. She can help us gather what’s left of the tribe. Peter nods. As we hear-

dialogues.speaker: SKINNY ORPHAN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Peter? Peter turns to see the Skinny Orphan he stood up for back the Kensington Home staring back at him. Shocked. . SKINNY ORPHAN (CONT’D) It is you! What are you doing here? Peter holds his finger to his lips and keeps walking. The skinny orphan keeps pace.  Fuchs 10.9.13 96.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: When did you get here?

dialogues.speaker: SKINNY ORPHAN
dialogues.text: Oh, I was on the first shipment in, yesterday morning. Won’t tell anyone what we’re digging for, but everyone says it’s something big. Something different.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Listen, me and my friend, we’re looking for someone. Do you think you could help us?

dialogues.speaker: SKINNY ORPHAN
dialogues.text: Anything for you, Peter. INT. MINERS’ CAMP/KINGDOM MINE - DAY ON_AYAIN’A-- sitting with the OLDER MINERS sifting throug piles of rock.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Ayain’a... The holy woman looks up to see Peter and Tiger Lily with Skinny Orphan in tow. TIGER LILY (CONT’D) We need your help. She takes in Peter, uncertain. AYAIN’A (subtitles) Why has he come? To follow or to lead?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: (subtitles) To fight. AYAIN’A (subtitles Then I will help him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blackbeard is studying his war plans when--

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Captain. There’s a problem.  Fuchs 10.9.13 97.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON SMEE-- he looks nervous. Sweating profusely. The miners around him, stand in tangibly worried silence.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: (approaches ) What seems to be the issue, Mr. Smee?

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: Captain, sir, we’ve followed the cave map Hook told us about to the letter. And according to the map, the entrance to the Bin dom shoould be right here, but...well, see for yourself-- Instead of an entryway we see-_a MASSIVE IMPENETRABLE WAL decorated with row after row of ILLEGIBLE HIEROGLYPHIC-LI CARVINGS and STRANGE INDENTATIONS.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Fascinating. Blackbeard touches his hand to the wall. TURK, ; We've been trying to dig through it, sir, but no luck.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: I don’t know what’s on the other side of this wall, but to get to the hidden kingdom, I know we have to get through it. The map is clear. Are these tunnels wide enough to send in an air-Galleon?

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Indeed they are, sir.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Then bring one down here and blast this thing open with the long guns. I want us through to the other side by sun up. If the wall’s not gone by then, mark my words, one of you will be. With that, Blackbeard turns and exits.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: You heard the captain! Let’s MOVE! INT. MINERS’ CAMP/KINGDOM MINE - NIGHT A large grouping of captured NATIVES, many of them faces fh PE v tan recognize from the Cliff Village, have ga ered together. There’s a buzz in the air. All waiting for something.  Fuchs 10.9.13 98. When into the center of the room walks Ayain’a and Tiger Lily. Everyone falls silent. With that, AYAIN’A (subtitles) My people, this is our darkest hour. Blackbeard is almost upon the hidden kingdom and when he finds it, all will be lost. Desperate times call for desperate measures and so I ask you to listen to this bo Believe in him as his mother believed in us. Peter EMERGES from the crowd to a chilly response.

dialogues.speaker: TRIBESMAN 1
dialogues.text: That boy is the reason we’re in here!

dialogues.speaker: TRIBESMAN 2
dialogues.text: He and his friends revealed us to the pirates!

dialogues.speaker: TRIBESMAN 3
dialogues.text: We cannot trust him! AYAIN’A (subtitles)

dialogues.speaker: SILENCE
dialogues.text: Everyone shuts up. Peter has the floor. He looks to Tiger Lily next to him, who nods, encouragingly.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: (whispers in his ear) Make them believe...

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Hi. Tiger Lily translates. Everyone just stares back.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I know that some of you blame me for what has happened, but you need to know that was not my fault. Smee, a man I thought was a friend, betrayed me, but I never betrayed you. Do you understand? People seem unimpressed.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look, to be honest, I don’t know what I’m doing. I’m not a warrior. I’m certainly not_what you were expecting, but...I’m what you got. And I know that if we don’t stand up, together, like my mum did, like my dad did, that we won’t get another chance. This is it. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And so, whatever you believe about me or don’t...I’m not asking you to fight for me. (thinks ) I’m asking you to fight with me. Because I can’t do this alone. But if we stand together, those miners out there will’ stand with us and then, guess what, we have the numbers! Not them. Us! We are as strong as we choose to be!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone CHATTERS quietly among themselves. The speech is having an impact.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let us choose to be strong! Let us choose to be brave! It’s what my mother would've asked of you then. It’s what I beg of you now. Ayain’a smiles watching the room take this all in. Tiger looks to Peter, impressed.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: This is what you called ‘pep’ talk? (she nods) You are better at it. Peter smiles. Tiger Lily turns to her people.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So? I stand with Peter. Who else stands with me? The villagers continue to confer when--

dialogues.speaker: MAN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I have a question. All eyes turn to see-- KIOWA, alive, but badly wounded, l into the center of the room. Tiger Lily reacts, shocked t see him

dialogues.speaker: KIOWA
dialogues.text: You ask us to fight with you. To rise up. To risk our lives. But what makes you different? You lied to us before and because of it, our people died. Our village was destroyed. So I ask you now-- (locks eyes with Peter) Are you the one the prophesy spoke of? Peter hesitates. Then-

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: No. No, I’m not. Kiowa raises his hands, resting his case.  Fuchs 10.9.13 100.

dialogues.speaker: KIOWA
dialogues.text: Then I will not fight with him. And any man who does is a fool. With that, Kiowa exits and slowly, one by the room exits with him until it’s just Pe Tiger Lily and Ayain’a. one, everyone in ter, alone with The holy woman looks up at Peter with great sadness in he eyes. She says something to him and then exits.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: What did she say?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: She said you still do not believe, so they did not. (beat) And that you and I are alone now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter, storms out. Tiger Lily follows.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Would my mother have given up?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: You're not your mother! We can see on Peter’s face that comment land harder than Tiger Lily meant it to. He stops and faces her.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Your last memory of my mother, the one you showed me —-- my mother was fighting with the fairies, wasn’t she?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Yes, so?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: It was almost like she could speak to them, wasn’t it? Well, if she could do that...imagine what I could do? (then) If we can get into the kingdom, we might have a chance. I just need someone to show me the way. Tiger Lily shakes her head.  Fuchs 10.9.13 101.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: I can get you to the entrance gate, but -- what if they won't fight with you? If you can’t communicate with them like she could?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You mean what if I fail? Well, as someone once told me, then at least I’ve tried. (then) So what do you say? Tiger Lily hesitates -- then nods, yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blackbeard stares out at the dark Neverwood through the porthole window. There’s a KNOCK at the door. Turk enters

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Captain, we’ve spotted the boy. Blackbeard spins around.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Peter? Where?

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Sir, you’re not going to believe this, but...he’s in the tunnels. Blackbeard takes a deep breath, thinking.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Clear him a path. I don’t want him to know he’s being followed. Don’t let him out of your sight, Turk.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Yes, captain. Turk exits. Blackbeard turns back to the window.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Peter, Peter, Peter...what are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON THE GLYPH-WALL-- Peter stares at it. Mystified.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You’re sure this is it?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: I’m positive. It’s supposed to be here. I don’t understand.  Fuchs 10.9.13 102. Peter keeps looking at the wall.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Did the map say anything about how to get through this?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Nothing. I would have remembered that. Peter frowns. Then his brows raise.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: These markings...what language is this?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: This writing is in fairy. Why?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Because I don’ t know how, but -- I can read it.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: What does it say?

dialogues.speaker: PETER

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Yeah, but I don’t have-- Then he realizes -- reaches for his necklace.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That’s why she give me this. She left me with the keys to the kingdom. (realizing) She knew I'd come for her. And we watch as-- the wall finally opens to reveal: a TUN ENTRANCE beyond.  Fuchs 10.9.13 103.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Are you ready?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: As I’l1l ever be. He’s about to step forward when we hear-

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: Bravo, Peter. Bravo. They spin to see-- Blackbeard, joined by Turk, Smee and a collection of pirates with guns drawn aS an air-Galleon m into position behind them.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If only your mother knew that you would unlock the hidden kingdom for the very man to whom she gave her life to keep it safe. Peter and Tiger Lily are trapped. Nowhere to run.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now, let’s step inside and have a look. Shall we?

dialogues.text: Peter’s POV:

dialogues.text: Please... ON TIGER LILY- as she struggles against Turk. Helpless. H too strong. ON BLACKBEARD-- smiles as multiple air-Galleons join the Revenge, spewing flames over the Fairy Kingdom. He lets g Peter.

dialogues.text: What is it like, Peter, to know that whatever you love is condemned to die? (then) I want you to kneel. Peter doesn’t do it.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I said -- kneel.  Fuchs 10.9.13 106.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (grits his teeth) I am a prince like my father. I am a warrior like my mother. I won’t bow for you or anyone else! If you want to kill me, get on with it! The FLAMES are picking up now. Blackbeard raises his swor

dialogues.text: As you wish. Brings the SWORD hurtling down--

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: This ain’t nap time, kid! Man a gun! Peter RACES to one of the long guns.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: We need to blow a hole in the ceiling! The fairies are going to burn up down here unless we give them a way out!

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: How do you know that?!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: They told me. Hook nods. Then does a genuine double take.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don’t ask. ON THE REVENGE-- Blackbeard barks orders at Turk.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD
dialogues.text: I want that ship blown out of the sky! Do you hear me?! He turns to see Tiger Lily holding off four different pir and immediately engages.

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBEARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Mind if I cut in? VWOOSH! He SWIPES at her, drawing blood. Tiger Lily smile Blackbeard withdraws his second Wushu blade. A worthy competitor.

dialogues.speaker: BEGIN TO TEAR IT APART.
dialogues.text: ON HOOK-- looks back at Peter operating the cannon.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Have oe hit one thing yet?! Hit something! Anything!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Give me a clear shot, why don’t you?! Hook SPINS the wheel hard, tilting the ship at an angle.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Take it!  Fuchs 10.9.13 108. BANG! Peter unleashes a wave of cannon-fire at the roof o the cavern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The miners -- including the natives -- are going about th business when- The entire ground beneath them begins to rumble. BANG! Another rumble. Everyone RACES to clear the floor of the as--

dialogues.speaker: REVEALING THE FAIRY KINGDOM AND THE BATTLE BELOW.
dialogues.text: The miners gather around the edge of the gaping earthen h and begin to watch, transfixed by what they’re seeing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON HOOK’S AIR-GALLEON-- we see the hole in the cavern cei open up and the fairies begin to filter out.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: There we go! Was that so hard? Peter ruefully shakes his head. As the escape from the pirates continues-—

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: So, what happened? You came back. I thought you didn’t care.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK

Tiger Lily, still battling Blackbeard, sees the ships proximity and backs her way out of the fight onto Hook’s ship. Now the ships are racing neck-and-neck, figer Lily on Hoo ships Blackbeard on the Revenge. Blackbear however, is fighting with two swords. He’s beyond good with a blade; virtuosic. ON TIGER LILY-- as- WHAM! Blackbeard knocks her blade out her hand. He’s about to land the killer blow when--

Fuchs 10.9.13 109. ON TIGER LILY- as the pirates restrain her. Peter SCAMPER for cover, He’s surrounded, backed up against the port-si of the ship, as Blackbeard and the pirates close in. ON HOOK’S FACE-- as he turns back to see Peter’s gone and that he’s now a sitting duck. ON BLACKBEARD-- sees the same thing.

dialogues.text: What is he doing?  Fuchs 10.9.13 110. ON TIGER LILY-- silently praying.

dialogues.text: Tell me you believe in the prophesy, Hook! Tell me you elieve! I need to hear it! Hook, wounded, bloodied, shakes his head as they near the ground.

dialogues.text: I don't...

dialogues.text: (sees something behind him) Peter. Peter turns to see the WHITE LIGHTS COMING TOGETHER ONE B ONE BY ONE to form an image. Peter steps toward it.

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN'S VOICE
dialogues.text: (whisper) Peter... Only he can hear it, as more fairies join together, the i clarifying. WOMAN’S VOICE (CONT’D) Peter... ON PETER’S FACE-- as tears come to his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Mum? Reverse to see:

dialogues.speaker: A LIVING SPECTRAL PORTRAIT OF MARY, MORE BEAUTIFUL THAN E
dialogues.text: She smiles at her son. Her voice echoes in his head.

dialogues.speaker: MARY
dialogues.text: You found me. Peter can barely keep it together, then, notices--  Fuchs 10.9.13 114.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I have your eyes...

dialogues.speaker: MARY
dialogues.text: You have my heart. Mary smiles. Peter is overwhelmed, shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I’ve imagined this moment my whole life and now -- now I don’t even know what to say. I love you, mum. So much. I don’t know how you can miss someone you’ve never imet so much -- every day.

dialogues.speaker: MARY
dialogues.text: I can’t stay long, my son...

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: No, mum, don’t go! I did all this for you! Without you, I’m lost again! What do I do now?

dialogues.speaker: MARY
dialogues.text: You are not lost. You are home -- on this island with these people. Your people. Your famil And you must never give up on t ém, as you never gave up on me. The image begins to distort.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Mum, I just don’t want to lose you, again!

dialogues.speaker: MARY
dialogues.text: You will never lose me. I will always be a part of this place -- and a part of you. I love you my son. (then) Peter. My Péter ban . And with that the image is gone, the fairies flying off i million different directions. ANGLE ON PETER’S TEAR-STREAKED FACE-- as, for the first t he finally lets go of the pain...and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter walks through the mine to a hero’s greeting. ON TIGER LILY-- as she finds Kiowa in the crowd. They embrace.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: I thought we’d lost you.  Fuchs 10.9.13 115.

dialogues.speaker: KIOWA
dialogues.text: You almost did. (then, re: Peter) You were right, though. As usual.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: (smiles) Can I ask you something? ON HOOK-- watching Tiger Lily speaking with Kiowa in the distance and then-- his face falls as the two EMBRACE.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (approaches ) You going to be okay? He HOLDS up his arm to reveal-- his right hand is GONE.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Good Lord! How did that happen! Hook POKES his hand through his shirt-sleeve.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Nah, I should be fine. Thanks to you. Peter smiles and is about to move on when-

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey! (quietly) What I said to you up there...

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Yes?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Don’t tell anybody. Hook smiles. Peter moves on as Tiger Lily walks up.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Princess. What can I do for you?

dialogues.speaker: . TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: I just wanted to thank you for your contributions to my people.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: To your people?

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Yes. We thank you. We were also wondering whether you had plans to stay on?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: We were? Or you were?  Fuchs 10.9.13 116.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Why are you always so difficult?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Because you like me difficult. Tiger Lily doesn’t know what to say.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: So, you'll be returning to your world then?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: I will be. Unless your people have any objection.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: None.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Good.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: Good! (then) Excuse me. Tiger Lily leaves. Hook almost goes after, then doesn’t. ON PETER-- thronged by miners. Tiger Lily fights her way get to him and pulls him away. TIGER LILY (CONT’D) I wanted to speak to you about whether you planned on staying with us. The fight isn’t over. Blackbeard may be dead, but Turk still lives. the air-fleet is untouched. There are still so many camps to liberate and-

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Tiger Lily -- stop. Your fight is my fight. I’m not going anywhere. (thinks) On one condition.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: And what’s that?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I_ need to make a quick visit to an old friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nibs settles into his bed for the night when we HEAR a TH Nibs ignores it until- THUMP. There it is again.  Fuchs 10.9.13 117. Nibs sits up. THUMP. And as he looks to the shuttered win it BURSTS open to reveal:

dialogues.speaker: NIBS
dialogues.text: Peter! Peter steps into the dormitory as every orphan shoots out bed, astonished.

dialogues.speaker: TER
dialogues.text: You didn’t "think I’d leave you all alone in here did you? Nibs, gobsmacked, shakes his head no.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Still feel like getting out of here? Nibs GRINS from ear to ear. Peter eyes a broom in the cor of the room.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Give me that. INT. FATHER PRATCHETT’S OFFICE - CONTINUOUS Pratchett lies in bed, asleep when-- his eyes FLASH open. hear the pitter- patter of little feet coming from the ce above and Pratchett leaps out of bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratchett races up to the dormitory door and tries to ent but can’t. He POUNDS on the door, but it won’t budge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE BROOMSTICK-- jammed into the door handles, keepin Pratchett out, while Peter escorts each and every orphan of the Kensington Home and onto--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE ROGER-- docked at the top floor window. Onboard, Hook leads a small crew, including Tiger Lily, who still looks upset. Peter and Hook help the orphans board.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: (re: Tiger) Hey, what's bugging her?  Fuchs 10.9.13 118.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Are you mental? She gave up Kiowa for you and you’re not even going to stay. I’d be pretty upset if I were her. Wouldn’t you? Hook reacts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratchett keeps BANGING on the door until-- BWOOSH! He CRASHES through just in time to see the very last orphan off the window sill and onto the Roger. Pratchett reaches the window to see the ship making its w into the night sky.

dialogues.speaker: PRATCHETT
dialogues.text: (scowls) Peter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Roger begins its ascent, the orphans all settle in the journey.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Jeez, Pete, you didn’t tell me it'd be this many kids.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: (glares at him) He’s a prince. He gets what he wants. Leave him alone. Hook follows her. Nibs looks to Peter.

dialogues.speaker: . NIBS
dialogues.text: ‘Prince’?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: We have a lot of catching up to do. ON HOOK- as he prepares to make the voyage.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER, LILY
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Had a change of heart. Getting ready for the voyage back, Princess.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER LILY
dialogues.text: I thought you wanted to go home.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: I am going home.  Fuchs 10.9.13 119. Tiger Lily smiles. And as the Roger continues its ascent- EXT. GIRL’S BEDROOM/LONDON - SAME TIME We're at the window sill, where a beautiful GIRL (10), si in a proper powder-blue nightgown, stroking an adorable NEWFOUNDLAND PUPPY cradled on her lap. Her attention is f on the puppy until the dog barks, drawing her attention upward to see-- THE JOLLY ROGER SILHOUETTED “E.T.” STYLE AGAINST THE MOON The girl GASPS just as- GIRL’S MOTHER (0.S.) Sweetheart, come to bed!

dialogues.speaker: GIRL
dialogues.text: But mother-- GIRL’S MOTHER (0.S.) Wendy Moira Angela Darling, you come to bed this very instan

dialogues.speaker: WENDY
dialogues.text: (sighs ) Coming mother! Come on, Nana. She exits and the dog follows her out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And as the Roger soars into the heavens, the FIRST MATE ( approaches Hook.

dialogues.speaker: FIRST MATE
dialogues.text: Course heading, Captain? Hook doesn’t respond -- doesn’t realize he’s the captain

dialogues.speaker: FIRST MATE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Uh -- Captain Hook? Hook finally realizes. Tiger Lily rolls her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: HOOK
dialogues.text: Oh, uh, set a course... Looks to Peter.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Second star to_the right. And straight on til morning. And with that- we PULL WIDE and watch as the Jolly Roger ascends into the heavens. We stay with it until it banks left, disappearing behind Big Ben before we hear, but don see, the familiar -- VWOOSH!  Fuchs 10.9.13 120. -- of the Roger SHOOTING vertically into the heavens, pas the stars and onto another world before we-- SMASH TO BLACK. END CREDITS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peaceful. Undisturbed until-- KVWOOSH! A metal beam with net attached CRASHES to the floor, sending sea life scattering. As the beam begins bottom trawling the ocean floor, in a single shot we TRAIL the CHAINS guiding . us toward the surface, breaking through the water to find--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An AIR-GALLEON floating, on the deck of which stands--

dialogues.speaker: SMEE
dialogues.text: You’re sure this is where the wreckage of the Revenge would have settled?

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Positive. The ship JERKS.

dialogues.speaker: HELMSMAN
dialogues.text: Mr. Turk! We've found the ship!

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Take it up. And ready the pixum. Lots of it.

dialogues.speaker: HELMSMAN
dialogues.text: The pixum? For who, sir? Turk eyes Smee with a glimmer in his eye.

dialogues.speaker: TURK
dialogues.text: Blackbeard. CUT TO BLACK.
